attributes.action: have the casino panel re-consider their decision not to award a regional casino license to Blackpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The North & Western Lancashire Chamber of Commerce publicly supports Blackpool’s bid for a super casino license and is extremely disappointed with the panels’ decision to grant the first regional license to Manchester.

Blackpool is the RIGHT and logical place for a regional casino and has carefully and thoughtfully prepared to deliver a casino-based regeneration plan for years unlike its competitors.  Blackpool has the full backing of the Chamber and the North West Development Agency amongst other stakeholders.

The Chamber has outlined the above comments, along with many more important points, in extensive correspondence with the Secretary of State for the Department of Culture, Media and Sport; Tessa Jowell.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
